data.title: Matthew Settle
data.meta_description: Jeffrey Matthew Settle is an American actor. He is known for playing Captain Ronald Speirs on the 2001 HBO miniseries Band of Brothers and Rufus Humphrey on the CW teen drama series Gossip Girl.
